title: Dad tries to save baby from sinking car by throwing him towards bridge
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

This terrifying video shows the moment a car was was knocked off a bridge and plunged into the water with a baby inside.

The car fell into the water after colliding with a red truck on a narrow bridge in Madhya Pradesh, central India, at around 2.30pm yesterday.

In a desperate attempt to save the child, a driver scrambles out the window of the sinking car and launches his baby back towards the bridge.

Locals who’d gathered to help attempted to catch the child but missed by inches.

The baby bounces off the side of the bridge and falls back into the water to the horror of onlookers who then jump in to rescue it.

This is the shocking moment a car crossing a bridge in Madhya Pradesh, central India, is shunted into the water by a passing truck (Picture: SWNS)

The car teeters over the edge with a baby inside (Picture: SWNS)

Passengers scramble out of the window to safety (Picture:SWNS)

The driver throws the baby towards the bridge as the car sinks (Picture: SWNS)

The family were taken to hospital after the crash (Picture: SWNS)

Other trapped family members can be seen clibing out the window of a car as a second helper throws a long red cloth into the water to pull them out.

The dramatic incident was captured on CCTV, which shows the red truck driving off amidst the chaos caused by the incident.

The family was rescued and sent to hospital, where they are undergoing treatment.
description: Dad tries to save baby from sinking car by throwing him towards bridge
